regulatory_basis: SAE AS8775 - Aircraft Engine Electrical Ignition System

effectivity.scope: All AMPEL360 configurations with turbine engines requiring ignition systems

source_documents: IGN-SAS-74-001: Ignition Control Software Accomplishment Summary (DO-178C Level A)
IGN-QUAL-74-001: Ignition System Qualification Test Report
IGN-ICD-74-001: Interface Control Document to ATA-24 Electrical Power
IGN-ICD-74-002: Interface Control Document to FADEC

hazards: Loss of ignition capability preventing engine start
Loss of ignition during flight preventing engine relight
High-voltage arc causing electrical fire or personnel injury
Ignition system EMI affecting other avionics
Lightning strike damage to ignition system
airworthiness_limitation_items: Dual-channel redundancy with independent power supplies
Software certification to DO-178C Level A
Igniter spark energy and timing accuracy

subdirectories.name: OVERVIEW
subdirectories.description: System description, architecture, ignition principles, performance

subdirectories.name: SAFETY
subdirectories.description: FHA, PSSA, SSA, HAZOP, FMEA, high-voltage safety, lightning protection

subdirectories.name: REQUIREMENTS
subdirectories.description: ALR, SR, SSR, CR, RTM, regulations mapping

subdirectories.name: DESIGN
subdirectories.description: System architecture, redundancy philosophy, ICDs, specifications

subdirectories.name: INTERFACES
subdirectories.description: Mechanical, electrical, high-voltage, data bus, engine, FADEC

subdirectories.name: ENGINEERING
subdirectories.description: Analyses, simulations, FEA studies, MBSE models, scripts

subdirectories.name: V_AND_V
subdirectories.description: Verification and validation plans, test cases, evidence

subdirectories.name: CERTIFICATION
subdirectories.description: Compliance matrices, certification evidence, authority approvals

subdirectories.name: OPERATIONS_AND_MAINTENANCE
subdirectories.description: AMM, CMM, IPC, TSM references, service intervals
